attributes.action: Vote to leave the EHCR to allow us to control our boarders
attributes.additional_details: Our country can not continue with the state of our migration system we our rewarding eligal migration with free housing and benefits from our tax system we must leave the EHCR and US the public should be allowed to vote on this matter as it is us that our paying in the tax system to pay for all of people entering the UK elgally this can not continue our country is at breaking point our public is at risk from the eligall Migration and nobody is standing up for our human rights our they.
attributes.background: Allow the public to vote to leave the EHCR to allow us to control our boarders and remove eligal migration without all the red tape and alow us to stop having to pay millions in benifit and housing cost for eligal migration and alow us to remove criminal migrants from our country

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Withdraw from ECHR & stop processing asylum claims until Channel crossings stop
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741099
